meanings.definition: Overtimes: additional time worked beyond regular hours
meanings.sent1: She earned extra money by working overtims at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The employees were paid more for working overtims during the busy season.
meanings.sent3: The idea of working overtims on a Friday night made her groan.
meanings.sent4: The concept of overtims seemed like a never-ending cycle of work.
meanings.sent5: The thought of overtims brought a sense of exhaustion to her mind.

meanings.definition: Overtimes: periods of time in a game or competition that exceed the normal duration
meanings.sent1: The basketball game went into overtims due to a tie score.
meanings.sent2: The hockey team won the match during the overtims.
meanings.sent3: Watching the overtims of the soccer game was thrilling.
meanings.sent4: The overtims of the race felt like a suspenseful bonus round.
meanings.sent5: The audience cheered loudly during the intense overtims of the match.
